original_title: Role Playing Systems aka Level Up
overview: I explore a day long experience of watching my wife's Baltimore improv group Lekker prepare and perform in Baltimore, 2013. Filmed on iPhone 4, edited in iMovie. Emphasizing color, improvisation, rhythm in human interaction, emergent communication in wordplay, environment and hopefully impressions of the audience's subjective experience.
tagline: Communal improvisations in real time, Baltimore ca 2013
title: Role Playing Systems aka Level Up
